ModMetaData.name: [PL] What's Wrong - Colonist Needs Tracker
ModMetaData.author: Assistant
ModMetaData.description: Track all your colonists' unmet needs in one convenient interface! This mod adds a tab at the bottom of the screen that opens a window showing all colonists with unmet needs. Click on any need to jump directly to that colonist. Perfect for quickly identifying and addressing colonist problems before they become serious issues.
